_description: Optimizer that implements the FTRL algorithm.

initial_accumulator_value._description: The starting value for accumulators. Only zero or positive values are allowed.

learning_rate_power._description: A float value, must be less or equal to zero.

l1_regularization_strength._description: A float value, must be greater than or equal to zero.

l2_regularization_strength._description: A float value, must be greater than or equal to zero.

l2_shrinkage_regularization_strength._description: A float value, must be greater than or equal to zero. This differs from L2 above in that the L2 above is a stabilization penalty, whereas this L2 shrinkage is a magnitude penalty.

use_locking._description: If True, use locks for update operations.

name: ftrl
